Maven 2 IDEA UI Designer Plugin

This plugin provides the capability to convert *.form files into Java code with the goal "ideauidesigner:javac2".

The plugin supports Intellij IDEA 7.0.3 Form generation code. If you need version 5.1, use version 1.0-alpha-1 of the plugin.

To learn how to use the plugin, click here.

Alternatives

Use the ant task provided by Intellij and the maven-antrun-plugin.

Links

How to use UI designer ANT task?
